activeIngredients: Soft & comfortable w/ highly absorbent core (w/ absorbent granules) for protection. Specifically shaped to fit male anatomy. W/ adhesive strip to hold the pad in place in underwear
details.atc: V07AN - Incontinence equipment ; Used as incontinence equipment.

activeIngredients: Absorbs rapidly large quantities of urine through the FeelDry™ Layer. Has cloth-like material & Body-close Fit™ that provide soft elastics & ensure comfortable fit. Provides effective leakage prevention through the Anti-Leakage Barrier. W/ breathable, textile-like material backsheet that releases heat for better skin care. W/ Odour Control for complete discretion.
details.atc: V07AN - Incontinence equipment ; Used as incontinence equipment.

activeIngredients: Open diaper w/ max absorption & security against leakage. Offers cloth-like backsheet cover & moisturising Aloe vera top sheet that are soft & gentle against skin. W/ superfit re-adjustable tape that allows fixation tapes to be resealed & readjusted anywhere on non-woven backsheet for comfortable fit & wear. W/ FeelDry™ Layer & a dual core technology w/ odour neutralizer that offers rapid absorption & retention for dryness. Inhibits growth of harmful bacteria & prevents odour through its antibacterial core. W/ wetness indicator.
details.atc: V07AN - Incontinence equipment ; Used as incontinence equipment.

activeIngredients: Open diaper that offers Super Absorbent Dry Core & prevents leakage through the absorbent Dry Fast Core™ & Anti-Leakage Barrier™, respectively. Has a body shape design that follows the body's contours for snug fit. W/ wetness indicator.
